item.title: CVE-2024-22163|2024-01-31T17:57:37.482Z -- shield%20security -- shield%20security%20%E2%80%93%20smart%20bot%20blocking%20%26%20intrusion%20prevention%20security
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Shield Security Shield Security – Smart Bot Blocking & Intrusion Prevention Security allows Stored XSS.This issue affects Shield Security – Smart Bot Blocking & Intrusion Prevention Security: from n/a through 18.5.7.
